about_me.des: I am a Software Engineer currently in Seoul helping autonomous mobile robots deliver goods. My interest lies in Robotics and background in Electronics and Control Engineering. Looking to sharpen my skills in Software Engineering and broadening my skill set and experience.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.yujinrobot_des: Developing software and scripts for autonomous mobile robots delivering goods. Using Python and C++ in ROS.
career.master_des: Graduate Thesis: Human-X Cooperative Teleoperation. GPA: 4.35/4.50
career.master_job: Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering (Robotics)
career.biolab_des: Research in Robot-Human Interaction and Teleoperation.
career.wavetec_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_job: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronic Engineering
